line.token: "This method is useful when most of your files end up in the 'Upload' folder. This task will put all the HAS_ONE and HAS_MANY files into the following folders {CLASSNAME}_{FIELDNAME}. You can run this task safely, as it will only execute with a special GET parameter (i.e. it defaults to run in test-mode only)."

* only show the summary OR the full details
* summaries only is not available for non-test tasks
